PRC 'MemoryC' (version 5)
-------------------------


MENU
====
  [1] Allocate mMemory
  [2] Free memory
  [3] Show lists
  [4] Show/hide menu
  [5] Quit
choice: printing of MENU is diabled
FreeList:
---------
  0:  addr:1000  size: 100
AllocList:
----------
  <empty>
[ALLOC] address: 1000 (20 byte)
[ALLOC] address: 1020 (30 byte)
[ALLOC] address: 1050 (2 byte)
FreeList:
---------
  0:  addr:1052  size:  48
AllocList:
----------
  0:  addr:1000  size:  20
  1:  addr:1020  size:  30
  2:  addr:1050  size:   2
[FREE]  address: 1020 (30 byte)
[FREE]  address: 1000 (20 byte)
FreeList:
---------
  0:  addr:1000  size:  50
  1:  addr:1052  size:  48
AllocList:
----------
  0:  addr:1050  size:   2
[FREE]  address: 1050 (2 byte)
FreeList:
---------
  0:  addr:1000  size: 100
AllocList:
----------
  <empty>
